abstract: Yahoo‘s first-quarter financial results issued Tuesday slightly exceeded Wall Street’s expectations, but analysts said the numbers were not likely to aid Yahoo’s efforts to fend off Microsoft‘s hostile bid or to extract a higher price.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo‘s first-quarter financial results issued Tuesday slightly exceeded Wall Street’s expectations, but analysts said the numbers were not likely to aid Yahoo’s efforts to fend off Microsoft‘s hostile bid or to extract a higher price.

headline.main: Yahoo’s Results Hold Steady as Microsoft Looms
